/opt/cray/pe/gcc/12.2.0/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG -shared -Wl,-soname,libpsztest_utils_cu.so -o libpsztest_utils_cu.so CMakeFiles/psztest_utils_cu.dir/src/utils/rand.seq.cc.o CMakeFiles/psztest_utils_cu.dir/src/utils/rand.cu_hip.cc.o  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/cuda/12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib:/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/math_libs/12.4/lib64 /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/cuda/12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/math_libs/12.4/lib64/libcurand.so -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.so
